meanings.sent1: The small dog yaffed at the mailman every morning.
meanings.sent2: The excited puppy yaffed happily during playtime.
meanings.sent3: The yaffing dog woke up the whole neighborhood!
meanings.sent4: The thunder yaffed through the night, startling everyone.
meanings.sent5: The yaffing sound echoed in the empty street.

meanings.sent1: The children yaffed about their favorite cartoons all day.
meanings.sent2: During the party, everyone yaffed and laughed together.
meanings.sent3: She yaffed on and on about her new shoes, not noticing the time.
meanings.sent4: His words yaffed around the room, making everyone chuckle.
meanings.sent5: The group yaffed loudly, not caring who heard them.
